Reviews.Title: great idea, but unreliable
Reviews.Author: joboater
Reviews.Content: I bought this thinking it was the perfect solution for my daily driver.  I soon discovered that it is flaky and no longer depend on it.  It could be my unit but I waited too long to install it and it is no longer in warranty. I suggest that you steer clear of this product.

ProductInfo.Features:
Digital Video Recording System With Quad Screen Processor
Provides Around-The-Clock Video Surveillance Recording Of Vehicle
Allows 4 Different Cameras To Record Simultaneously

Recordings Can Be Viewed On A Quad Monitor In Vehicle Or On Home Computer
